jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
Overview
Driver Platform Product group is responsible for maintaining 4 core driver-partners that Gojek supply fleet uses which are GoRide, GoCar, GoKilat, and GoBluebird driver-partners as well as the backend systems that power the driver apps.

We are aiming to provide the best experience to driver-partners, improve the effectiveness and efficiency of our driver-partners communication, ensure that we protect our drivers and provide them peace of mind, ensure that driver-partners earn a sustainable income. This includes savings and/or potential revenue avenues.

Who Are We Looking For?
We are looking for a thoughtful and responsible engineer for the Driver Platform team who appreciates good engineering and user experience. The person should be passionate about maintaining clean and maintainable codebase. Lastly, someone who can empathize with our driver-partners for whom our app is the only way of livelihood.

jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Work as part of a cross-functional, passionate and agile project team to ensure quality is driven into the heart of the development process from requirements definition through to delivery
  • Designing, developing and supporting frameworks for our test infrastructure and providing automation expertise to our development teams
  • Research, recommend and implement tools as needed with the goal of increasing automation
  • Mentor team members on automation
  • Be meticulous about documentation and maintaining a robust log of all test cases and test results
  • Ensure that all tests are executed and give regular feedback to the team on the status of quality

• Thorough understanding of SDLC, specifically automated QA processes in agile development environments

    • Must-have:
  • Automation - App Testing - Android
  • Scripting experience in any static language (like Java)
  • Experience in scripting automation tests on Appium based frameworks
  • Manual + Automation - API Testing (Microservices)
  • Basic Linux Skills
  • Basic Experience in CI/CD setup - Gitlab CI/Jenkins or any other

    • Good-to-have:
  • Scripting experience in any dynamic language (like Ruby, Python, etc)
  • Performance Testing using - JMeter, Gatling, Vegeta, etc. Java, TestNG, Appium, REST, Appium(Must), REST-based automation frameworks like RestAssured
  • JMeter or Gatling (Or relevant tools)
  • Ruby or Python (or any Dynamic scripting language)
